name: Funnel Analysis
description: Analyze conversion funnel performance and identify drop-off points
prompt_text: Analyze the '{funnel_name}' conversion funnel for the {segment} segment with the goal to {optimization_goal}. The funnel consists of the following stages: {funnel_stages}. For each stage transition, calculate the conversion rate, identify the magnitude and velocity of drop-offs, and hypothesize the most likely causes based on common UX and behavioral patterns. Compare stage performance against industry benchmarks where applicable, and flag any stages where small improvements would yield disproportionate impact on overall funnel throughput. Deliver a prioritized action plan with quick wins and longer-term structural improvements.

variables.name: funnel_name
variables.label: Funnel Name
variables.placeholder: e.g., Trial-to-Paid, Signup Flow, Feature Adoption
